Instruction: Combine confectioners' sugar, flour, baking powder, and ground cloves in a medium bowl. Mix in the beaten eggs and almond extract until well combined.
Shape the dough into 1/2 inch balls and place them on a well-greased cookie sheet. Cover the cookies with a tea towel and let them stand overnight. The cookies will rise and spread.
Bake cookies until they are golden brown, approximately 10 to 15 minutes.
These would complement a pudding or creamy dessert nicely.
